member.name: Gdiplus.GetImageDecoders
member.summary: The GetImageDecoders function gets an array of ImageCodecInfo objects that contain information about the available image decoders.
member.param: Integer that specifies the number of available image decoders. Call to determine this number.
Integer that specifies the size, in bytes, of the array ofImageCodecInfo objects. Call to determine this number.
Pointer to a buffer that receives the array ofImageCodecInfo objects. You must allocate memory for this buffer. Call to determine the size of the required buffer.

returns.para: If the function succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the function fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Gdiplus.GetImageDecodersSize
member.summary: The GetImageDecodersSize function gets the number of available image decoders and the total size of the array ofImageCodecInfo objects that is returned by the function.
member.param: Pointer to a UINT that receives the number of available image decoders.
Pointer to aUINT that receives the total size, in bytes, of the array ofImageCodecInfo objects that is returned by the function.

returns.para: If the function succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the function fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Gdiplus.GetImageEncoders
member.summary: The GetImageEncoders function gets an array ofImageCodecInfo objects that contain information about the available image encoders.
member.param: Integer that specifies the number of available image encoders. Call to determine this number.
Integer that specifies the size, in bytes, of the array ofImageCodecInfo objects. Call to determine this number.
Pointer to a buffer that receives the array ofImageCodecInfo objects. You must allocate memory for this buffer. Call to determine the size of the required buffer.

returns.para: If the function succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the function fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: Gdiplus.GetImageEncodersSize
member.summary: The GetImageEncodersSize function gets the number of available image encoders and the total size of the array ofImageCodecInfo objects that is returned by the function.
member.param: Pointer to aUINT that receives the number of available image encoders.
Pointer to aUINT that receives the total size, in bytes, of the array ofImageCodecInfo objects that is returned by .

returns.para: If the function succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the function fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.
